about_the_game:
USA! USA! USA! With this set of all-American Customization options, you'll be bleeding red, white and blue! Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the US Forces.

Provides instant access to selected items normally accessed via leveling up for the US Army and USMC factions.

  • Vest and Pants
  • Mullet
  • Bandanna
  • Do Rag
  • Stars 'n' Stripes Pilot Helmet
  • Glasses
  • Horseshoe Mustache
  • Born Free Tattoo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5GHz or AMD Phenom @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: 32-bit Operating Systems
